Itemized Passive Description:
*Activates the Entrance Animation upon the character's
entry*
- {passiveImg:once}Ki +8 and chance of performing a critical hit & damage
reduction rate 40%{passiveImg:up_g} for 5 turn(s)
*Basic effect(s)*
- Ki +3
- ATK & DEF 250%{passiveImg:up_g}
- Guards all attacks
- Receives an additional Ki +1 per Ki Sphere obtained
*When attacking*
- ATK 50%{passiveImg:up_g}
- Chance of performing a critical hit 20%{passiveImg:up_g} when Ki is 24
*When receiving an attack*
- DEF 80%{passiveImg:up_g}
- Damage reduction rate 20%{passiveImg:up_g} when Ki is 24
*After receiving an attack*
- Launches an additional Super Attack
- All allies' Ki +3 (self excluded)
*For every attack received*
- {passiveImg:forever}Ki +1 (up to +5)
- ATK & chance of performing a critical hit 20%{passiveImg:up_g} within the
turn
*After performing 5 or more attacks or receiving 8 or more
attacks in battle*
- {passiveImg:forever}Chance of performing a critical hit & damage reduction
rate 20%{passiveImg:up_g} and all allies' Ki +2 starting from the character's
next attacking turn

5299.superDescription:
Greatly raises ATK and raises DEF for 1 turn 
and causes colossal damage to enemy

SpecialBonus.Description: Super Attack power will be increased even more!

5300.superDescription:
Greatly raises ATK, 
raises DEF for 4 turns and 
causes mega-colossal damage to enemy

SpecialBonus.Description: Super Attack power will be increased even more!

5301.superName: Master and Disciple Special Beam Cannon
5301.superDescription:
Greatly raises ATK, raises DEF for 4 turns, 
causes mega-colossal damage to enemy 
and raises allies' chance of performing 
a critical hit by 20% for 1 turn; 
disables enemy's action once within the turn
5301.superCausality:
Activated when Ki is 18 or more with 
an ally whose name includes "Piccolo" 
(Demon King and Majin Buu excluded) 
attacking in the same turn

Button.Name: Is there 1 or more allies attacking on this turn whose name includes Piccolo?

2156.Paragraph Title: When there are 1 or more allies whose name includes "Piccolo" attacking in the same turn

SpecialBonus.Description: Super Attack power will be increased even more!

Active Skill.Name: Gohan's Confidence
Active Skill.Effect Description:
Ki +24, DEF +158%, directs enemy's attack 
towards the character and all attacks 
become critical hits for 1 turn
Active Skill.Condition Description:
Can be activated starting from next attacking turn 
after the character receives an attack (once only)
